titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 299) to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives regarding outside earned income.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-441, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H. Res. 299 with 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Providing for the consideration of H. Res. 299 in the House and waiving all points of order against a motion to amend the resolution printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 172.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 380 - 11, 1 Present (Roll no. 881).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/21/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Res. 299 (House of Representatives rules revision regarding outside earned income).
